remarks: Lemma for ~ irrapx1 .  Eliminate ranges, use positivity of the input to force positivity of the output by increasing ` B ` as needed. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 13-Sep-2014.)
statement:
irrapxlem4 $p |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. NN ) -> E. x e. NN E. y e. NN ( abs ` ( ( A x. x ) - y ) ) < ( 1 / if ( x <_ B , B , x ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
